dialogue.introduction: Aircraft carrier Katsuragi, heading forth! Watch what a true standard aircraft carrier is capable of!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Katsuragi, the third ship of the Unryuu-Class Carriers!  Yes, a standard aircraft carrier. Looks like I was late. But after the battle was over, I was working at full power. In a sense, I am the best. It's the truth! Really it's true!
dialogue.secretary1: That's right! Standard Carrier! Main Force! Main Force!
dialogue.secretary2: Do you understand? Give me your best aircraft!
dialogue.secretary3: I told you that's not my hangar! How many times did I-uuu... This time I'm not forgiving you!
dialogue.secretaryidle: I see I see, so this is Ryuusei Kai. Yup yup. I've heard about it... wait isn't that one a Reppuu? That's wonderful! They're perfect for me! Eh!?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, hey, if only this aircraft was resupplied I would... Eh, what? Even if you look at me with such gentle eyes, nothing... it will gain you nothing! Geez~
dialogue.wedding: What is it, Admiral? Can you see that I quite busy here, because this engine requires a lot of maintenance... what... this is... Thank you! I...
dialogue.show_players_score: Yup. reporting in is extremely important! Shall we go together?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Aircraft carrier Katsuragi and all aircraft, ahead! I will show you the true power of the remodeled Hiryuu-class!!
dialogue.equipment1: T-That equipment is not too bad. Yup.
dialogue.equipment2: Yes, this'll help in the fight! I'm happy.
dialogue.equipment3: I'll give it all I've got!
dialogue.expedition_selection: I'll give it all I've got!
dialogue.resource_collection: I'll give it all I've got!
dialogue.instant_repair: I'll give it all I've got!
dialogue.development: I'll give it all I've got!
dialogue.supply: Thanks for these valuable supplies. Yes, now I can head out again!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm going to the bath! You... don't you dare peek!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Eek... looks like this will take a while. Sorry, I'm going to the bath... I will kill you if you peek!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new member has been added to the force! I'm curious!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation completed. The fleet has returned. Well done everyone!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Carrier task force flagship, Katsuragi, launching! Whee... I've always wanted to say something like that!
dialogue.battle_start: Yes!!! Enemy fleet sighted! Here I go! First stike wave, launch all aircraft!
dialogue.air_battle: Attack force, starting! I... I'm a standard carrier!
dialogue.attack: Enemy spotted! All AA gun... Wait that's wrong, again from the top!!! Attack force, covering force, prepare to deploy!
dialogue.night_battle: Pursuing, huh? Going too far is restricted, but still sometimes needed... Alright, go!
dialogue.mvp: Me again? Sorry... Katsuragi unintentionally took 1st place. Sorry!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: No!? Is the flight deck ok? Prevent any secondary explosions! I... I don't want to sink!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: I, Katsuragi, can not sink at such place! Such attacks...!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I was hit... But the engine room is still undamaged! Can operate without problems!
dialogue.sunk: I see, this is sinking... cold... and lonely... bye-bye, everyone...
dialogue.fall_2015: Isn't autumn melancholic, somehow? Kinda. Huh? Amagi likes autumn? Why?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas, huh... This atmosphere, it's not bad. This is champagne? I- I see...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's almost a new year, I need to clean up my hangars... Hey, don't put your hands inside that, you idiot!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year to you! This year I will try my hardest to be a core of a mobile fleet!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, eh... I wonder if I can throw these beans at Unryuu-nee and Amagi-nee? Wait, that's no good! No good at all!

hourly.0000: Um...Today I, standard carrier Katsuragi, will be your secretary. What? Got a problem? I have enough time to do time announcement at least, enough time!
hourly.0100: 1:00 AM Is that okay? Are you listening? I see...then its fine! Alright!
hourly.0200: Its 2:00 AM...Hey...You aren't listening to my announcements! I see...really? Then, that's okay.
hourly.0300: 3:00 AM... See! You clearly didn't listen! Just what were you doing? ...huh, cooking?
hourly.0400: It's 4:00 AM... What? Night meal for me? That's hot pot with udon... well, thank you. It's delicious but... why?
hourly.0500: 5:00... Huh? Compared with my sister, the part that needs to stick out do not stick out, so I have to eat...? Y-You have done it! Any last word!?
hourly.0600: It's 6:00 AM. Hah... just what were you looking at when you are looking at us shipgirls? That place is irrelevant with our ability to perform... good grief...!
hourly.0700: It's 7:00 AM! I got mad at someone and get hungry as a result! You, you need to make breakfast... Isn't that right as a punishment? Yup punishment!
hourly.0800: It's 8:00! No way, your breakfast is... delicious! Where did you learn?... Eh... Amagi-nee? R-Really?
hourly.0900: It's 9:00. I really don't want to... But, a carrier's ability is not limited to her cooking! After all, a carrier is all about...
hourly.1000: It's 10:00 AM! Ah! Zuikaku-senpai! Good work as always!... ah, I was nervous! Well it was Zuikaku-san, the one I admire!
hourly.1100: 11:00 AM. Eh? What, it's true though! After all it's Zuikaku-san, the one I'm admiring! Isn't that wonderful...! I also like her camouflage, mine also matches hers!
hourly.1200: 12:00 PM. Ah! It's already lunchtime!? What are you doing for lunch? Going to Mamiya's or...unnn...
hourly.1300: 13:00 PM. Sometime it's good to go outside the harbor. You get a little of this disembark feeling... Ah! I-It's not like we're on a date or anything!
hourly.1400: It's 14:00 AM. It's not what you think! You're such an idiot... but that Western-style shop is really good... I wouldn't mind going there again.
hourly.1500: It's 15:00 PM! Ah, is Amagi-nee okay? Yup, I'm always perfect! Look! My maintenance is perfect, from my rocket launcher to the flight deck!
hourly.1600: It's 16:00 PM! Eh? What? AA defense? That's my special of special trick! What? Show it right here? It's very flashy, you'll see!
hourly.1700: 17:00 PM. It's already evening, after all that trick... Hah, I can't do any sortie or expedition...B-But I'll do it tomorrow!
hourly.1800: 18:00 PM. Evening already... well... If it's okay I'll do something simple! Rice ball with salt, pickled raikon radish... wait, green leaves with miso soup is alright, right?
hourly.1900: It's 19:00 PM. So? Is my riceball with sal... riceball seasoned with salt delicious? Of course, the level will only increase after this!
hourly.2000: 20:00. W-well sometime, I want to to go out as the main ship of the combined fleet... really.
hourly.2100: 21:00. So, what is your dream like? Isn't it fine, just tell me! Eh? Really? Ehh... Uhm... So it's like that...
hourly.2200: It's 22:00 PM. *humming* Eh? I'm not in a good mood, not such thing! I'm fine! I-am-fine! Ehehe
hourly.2300: 23:00. Finally, today was perfect! Good work from you too! Tomorrow will come soon, so how about a little rest? Huh? You're not gonna?
